newsitem.title: USA: GE Capital acquires Colonial Penn for $950 million.
newsitem.headline: GE Capital acquires Colonial Penn for $950 million.

text.p: GE Capital Services said on Monday it acquired Colonial Penn, a direct marketer of personal auto insurance, from Leucadia National Corp. for $950 million.
Colonial Penn, based in Norristown, Pa., will become a subsidiary of GE Capital's Richmond, Va.-based Consumer Savings and Insurance Group.
